  • Classes in fr.sii.ogham.sms.splitter used by fr.sii.ogham.sms.builder.cloudhopper 
    Class and Description
    MessageSplitter
    If the message is too long and can't fit in a single SMS, the message has to be split into several segments.
    ReferenceNumberGenerator
    In the cellular phone industry, mobile phones and their networks sometimes support concatenated short message service (or concatenated SMS) to overcome the limitation on the number of characters that can be sent in a single SMS text message transmission (which is usually 160).
  • Classes in fr.sii.ogham.sms.splitter used by fr.sii.ogham.sms.sender.impl.cloudhopper.preparator 
    Class and Description

    If the message is too long and can't fit in a single SMS, the message has to be split into several segments.
    Segment
    Represents a segment (part) of the original message.

    Class and Description
    MessageSplitter
    If the message is too long and can't fit in a single SMS, the message has to be split into several segments.
    Segment
    Represents a segment (part) of the original message.
    SupportingSplitter
    Extend splitter interface to indicate if the splitter implementations is able to split the provided message.
